greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Signed recurrence over binary strict trees: a(n) = 1 - Sum_{x + y = n, 0 < x < y < n} a(x) * a(y).
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
program: (PARI) seq(n)={my(v=vector(n)); for(n=1, n, v[n] = 1 - sum(k=1, (n-1)\2, v[k]*v[n-k])); concat([1], v)} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 27 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Mar 13 2018
